name: Amoxicillin
instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients, except the peated Scotch, in a mixing tin and shake with ice.
2. Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
3. Finish with six sprays of peated Scotch from an atomizer.
4. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

ingredients.name: Scotch whiskey
ingredients.description: Produced in Scotland, typically made from malted barley, and aged for a minimum period in oak barrels. Scotch can be further classified into single malt, single grain, blended malt, blended grain, and blended Scotch whisky.

ingredients.name: Yellow Chartreuse
ingredients.description: Yellow Chartreuse is a herbal liqueur made by the Carthusian monks in France. It is a milder and slightly sweeter version of Green Chartreuse, another famous liqueur produced by the same monks. Yellow Chartreuse is characterized by its yellow color and a complex flavor profile derived from a secret blend of 130 herbs and botanicals. It has a sweet and honeyed taste with herbal, floral, and spicy notes.

ingredients.name: Ginger syrup
ingredients.description:
Syrup infused with ginger root.

This ginger syrup is fantastic in cocktails, but it also makes an out-of-this-world ginger ale. To make ginger ale, simply fill an ice-filled glass a third of the way with the syrup, top with soda water and a squeeze of lime, stir and enjoy.
